text: Jaranwala railway station (, ) is located in the town of Jaranwala, Faisalabad District, Pakistan on the Pakistan Railway Shorkot–Sheikhupura Branch Line. ==Jaranwala-Lyallpur Branch Line== There was one railway line constructed between Jaranwala and Lyallpur(present-day Faisalabad), but it was later uprooted. Railway line land, bridges and railway stations between Jaranwala and Faisalabad still exist.https://books.google.ae/books?id=cETAisVSMjwC&printsec;=frontcover&hl;=ar&source;=gbs_ge_summary_r&cad;=0#v=onepage&q;=jaranwala&f;=falsehttps://books.google.ae/books?id=oGtj7MOrOj8C&printsec;=frontcover&hl;=ar&source;=gbs_ge_summary_r&cad;=0#v=onepage&q;&f;=false ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Faisalabad District Category:Railway stations on Shorkot–Sheikhupura line
title: Jaranwala railway station
